name: Whacktory
description:
CONTROLS

Hammer - LMB • Vacuum - Hold RMB • Rotate World - WASD/ARROWS

STORY

Evil factories continue to pop up around the world, pillaging the natural resources. You are armed with a hammer and a vacuum - SMASH THOSE FACTORIES, remove the smoke and destroy those volcanoes! Help keep the planet alive!

CREDITS

Created for Ludum Dare 46 Game Jam.
